channel.title: 🎨 Medium on CSx
channel.description: Recent content in 🎨 Medium on CSx

item.title: ✏️ Doodles
item.description: Influenced by a documentary Style Wars, which can be found 🔗here Staying in South Florida made me realize that my style was stagnant and childish Random doodles and sketches (2006-2007) I uh, nothing went up. Made a few stencils and had a few late nights, but nothing major Grew up listening to Beastie Boy songs thanks to my older brother. Hopefully some of that influence is apparent DPAP? If Oscar the Grouch and Grover were combined in a transporter accident and spent too much time in the badlands

item.title: 📷 Toronto, Canada
item.description: Three weeks in Toronto, Ontario, Canada Mostly hung out during the day and skated around at night. Dated someone that happened to live in Canada (trip 2 of 3) I’m not sure what compelled me to take this, but I enjoyed this view. I felt lucky and welcomed. 1.3MP shirt pocket camera? idk Niagara Falls photos were shot with an overkill waterproof instant camera. 🔗Marvel Heros Adventure City, Niagara Falls, Ontario

item.title: 📸 Canon SLR
item.description: Canon SLR I found an interesting camera on Ebay back in 2005 and played around with it for a few years. I’d like to point out that graffiti stencil stuff shown takes no sides–it was just an attempt to provoke thoughts. I was in my early twenties (selfies included). Printed via Me (2005-2007) Info on the printer & developer we used at the Millhopper CVS of Gainesville, FL: 🔗Bootlegged Banksy with a Noritsu
